name: Kantara: A Legend Chapter-1 (2025)
summary: Rishab Shetty has taken KFI to new heights. Incredible from a technical point, but as a movie in isolation - quite mediocre.
pros: Set design is better than many Hollywood movies
Incredible camera work and color grading
9/10 CGI work. Super realistic tiger and monkeys
Coastal Karnataka themes and language - always fun
cons: Feels like Rajamouli movie but Kannada. I'm not the target audience.
First movie did the Daiva part so much better. IMO the religious connect in this movie is not really there?
Very over the top and larger than life protagonist. Berme has no character development
Flow of the movie isn't smooth, cut from one set to another feels abrupt
No strong / natural emotions; very over the top
